name: Paralines The Last paladin
description: Year 0 of Ashy era, in the command of Lilith， the vanguard Simaxue headed the "Dusk Bell - the hell legion"(dusk bell), attacked the Millennium Parliament.Dusk bell finnally seized the Groan snowfield, Simaxue drew the "scythe of original sin" and triggered the "Original sin" storm.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7/Win10 Processor: Pentium 4级 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce FX5000级 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 互换声卡 Additional Notes: XP不可运行
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7/Win10 Processor: Pentium Dual Core级以上 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce FX5600级/ATI Radeon9600以上 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX可互换声卡 Additional Notes: XP不可运行
